review: Dr. Poonam is someone who indeed gives meaning to this profession. We usually think that doctor is someone who takes half of your pain the moment he/she starts talking to you and we experienced the same when we visited Dr. Poonam at Cloudnine hospital. I must recommend this Doctor.

Not at all in rush, which was very satisfactory and recommended only the required medicines. Asked for Blood test if in case fever goes beyond 102 for continues 2 days. I do recommend her.
